discourse_list.title: Meet the Dai Foundation Board during EthCC[5]

content.content: Meet the Dai Foundation Board during EthCC  DF Needs YOU1920×963 255 KB  Calling Maker community members. Come and engage with the Dai Foundation board and varm up for the Daivinity Party  About this event  As part of our Call for interest in becoming a Dai Foundation board member we are having this in-person community meeting for anyone interested to come and learn more about the work of Dai Foundation.  Agenda   Welcome - Introductions The Dai Foundation mandate Call for interest in becoming a Dai Foundation board member Call for grant applications Open discussion  Thanks to the @events-core-unit for helping out… Register here

Hi @sorenpeter this is Erwan from Backed. Adam (Backed CEO) and I would like to attend this event. As it is sold out online, could you please register our names or point me in the right direction? Thanks

Hi @Erwan Thanks for your interest in Dai Foundation. The interest for our meeting has been quite overwhelming given the niche area we operate in. We are unfortunately totally full. I will let you know if somebody yields their seat, but am I ready to have a separate meeting some other time during EthCC. Is there anything in particular you are interested in? Best Søren P
Hi @sorenpeter. Will there be a recording since the tickets are sold out?
Hi @nothsa Recording is not planned, but we can certainly have a virtual follow up session where we recap the meeting if there is sufficient interest.

I do have five extra tickets for the Dai Foundation event in Paris on July 19th. These are reserved for community members that considers whether to show interest in representing MakerDAO on the Dai Foundation board. Please reach out to me (@sorenpeter ) directly if you are interested in attending our meeting in Paris.

sorenpeter:  a virtual follow up session where we recap the meeting   I was not able to attend the event. So can you please tell me when you are going to do follow up session and If anyone have any recordings or clips of the event, please share it.

Hi @Rahii Thanks for your interest. You can see the slides from the event here  docs.google.com    20220719 Meet the Dai Foundation Board during EthCC Meet the Dai Foundation Board during EthCC Board of Trustees @ the Bridge Club 20220719      You are welcome to DM me (@sorenpeter ) for further info.
This topic was automatically closed after 90 days. New replies are no longer allowed.
